title: Best of The Program | Bill O’Reilly, Bob Woodson, & Jeanette Schade | 5/7/21
description:
Beaverton, Oregon, resident Jeanette Schade is running for her school board to fight against critical race theory, and she shares how Antifa has targeted her — but she’s not backing down. Bill O’Reilly reviews the newly released job data that shows how the economy is suffering under President Biden’s policies. Woodson Center founder Bob Woodson joins with Sylvia Bennett-Stone, executive director of Voices of Black Mothers United, to talk about how their organization is standing up for police and real change in black communities.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
